attributes.action: Crak down on gun crime and to stop illegal fire arms from entering the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would basically like to see the Government give tougher sentences to those people who carry a gun with them.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gun-Crime/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
